page.title: 06FIRE SERVICE,PUBS IN BRILL.
page.content: Brill fire station was built in 1937 and the tower in 1971.Today there are 9 part time firemen,although there should be 12.Each does 2 hours a week basic training for 6 weeks plus a course at Aylesbury fire station.Brill station covers a 4 mile radius.The fire engine carries 2,000 litres of water and 6 men. {PUBLIC HOUSES}:In Brill there are 3 pubs,The Red Lion,The Sun Hotel and The Pheasant.The Sun Hotel can provide accommodation for 12 people.It has a restaurant and bar snacks.The Pheasant has accommodation and a restaurant and a snackbar and ovelooks the windmill. In the Sun Hotel the beer is forced up the pipes by gas.Beers include bitter, Ben Truman,Skol,Guinness and old English beers.Every Friday ABC brewery deliver some more beer.It is open from 11am.to 2pm.and 6.30pm.to 11pm.
